overview:
Tenured Product Marketing Executive

Shaheen Kazi brings 18+ years of experience in technology marketing: from positioning & branding, to messaging and content creation, to driving Sales with lead-generation to Sales training and enabling. Shaheen also understands technology, which helps her build competitive G-2. Additionally she is a native speaker of digital, quantatitive marketing with experience in online and mobile advertising and post-click marketing, deep analytics – SEO, SEM, CPC, CPM, CPA, A/B testing, CRM, mCRM, and all elements of metrics-driven marketing. Published thought leader and industry spokesperson. Macro and micro strategy and analytics.

Shaheen Kazi lives and works in the San Francisco bay area.
